subject: RE: [junit] Possible TestCaseClassLoader bug
msgSnippet: ... [snip] ... You mean a reusable, embeddable test runner with real MVC design?  Try junit-addons or Artima SuiteRunner.  Not sure if they re embeddable
messageBody:
> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Vydra [mailto:david@...]
[snip]
> Thanks for your suggestion. I will investigte it. I am
> curious if anyone has written a version of console runner
> with class loading that can be called from java?

You mean a reusable, embeddable test runner with real MVC design? Try junit-addons or Artima SuiteRunner. Not sure if they're embeddable without some work, but they'd be the closest thing I can think of.

Best,
Scott Stirling
Framingham, MA
